project_details: Phone garage has three different states for Buyer, Seller & Admin with different functionalities.
Buyer can report and book products by completing payment | seller can add, delete & advertise their products | Admin can verify seller, delete buyer, seller & products and many things.
Security is ensured by JWT token and applying card operations.
FooDies is a company-based food related website where they sell and deliver items.
User can review on a particular item and show others review || user can also see his all comments, can edit and delete review. For adding review user must be login first.

User can login and register to the website which is managed by firebase

Here Admin can monitor all system.Admin can see the user who booked, add doctor and many things
